annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: ΕΝ

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: hereinafter referred to as 'the Communities' represented by the Council of the European Union and the European Commission,
annotations.translation: 以下称为由欧盟理事会和欧盟委员会代表的“共同体”，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: of the one part, and

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: THE REPUBLIC OF AZERBAIJAN,

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: of the other part,

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAVING REGARD TO the accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia to the European Union on 1 May 2004,
annotations.translation: 考虑到捷克共和国、爱沙尼亚、塞浦路斯、拉脱维亚、立陶宛、匈牙利、马耳他、波兰、斯洛文尼亚和斯洛伐克于 2004 年 5 月 1 日加入了欧盟；

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAVE AGREED AS FOLLOWS:

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 3

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 4

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 5

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 6

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 7

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia shall be Parties to the Partnership and Cooperation Agreement, establishing a partnership between the European Communities and their Member States, of the one part, and the Republic of Azerbaijan, of the other part, signed in Luxembourg on 22 April 1996 (hereinafter the Agreement) and shall respectively adopt and take note, in the same manner as the other Member States of the Community, of the texts of the Agreement and of the documents attached to it.
annotations.translation: 捷克共和国、爱沙尼亚、塞浦路斯、拉脱维亚、立陶宛、匈牙利、马耳他、波兰、斯洛文尼亚和斯洛伐克应为 1996 年 4 月 22 日在卢森堡签署的欧洲共同体及其成员国与阿塞拜疆共和国之间建立伙伴关系的《伙伴关系与合作协定》（下称《协定》）的缔约方，并应分别以与共同体其他成员国相同的方式采纳并参考《协定》文本及其所附文件。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: To take account of recent institutional developments within the European Union, the Parties agree that, following expiry of the Treaty establishing the European Coal and Steel Community, existing provisions in the Agreement referring to the European Coal and Steel Community shall be deemed to refer to the European Community, which has taken over all rights and obligations contracted by the European Coal and Steel Community.
annotations.translation: 考虑到欧盟内部最近的体制发展，各方同意，在建立欧洲煤钢共同体的条约到期后，协定中提及欧洲煤钢共同体的现有条款应视为指欧洲共同体，欧洲共同体已接手了欧洲煤钢共同体签订的所有权利和义务。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This Protocol shall form an integral part of the Agreement.
annotations.translation: 本议定书是本协定的组成部分。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. This Protocol shall be approved by the Communities, by the Council of the European Union on behalf of the Member States, and by the Republic of Azerbaijan in accordance with their own procedures.
annotations.translation: 1. 本议定书应由共同体、代表成员国的欧盟理事会以及阿塞拜疆共和国按照各自的程序批准。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. The Parties shall notify each other of the accomplishment of the corresponding procedures referred to in the preceding paragraph. The instruments of approval shall be deposited with the General Secretariat of the Council of the European Union.
annotations.translation: 2. 各方应互相通知前款所述相应程序的完成情况。批准书应交存欧盟理事会总秘书处。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. This Protocol shall enter into force on the same day as the 2003 Treaty of Accession, provided that all the instruments of approval of this Protocol have been deposited before that date.
annotations.translation: 1. 本议定书应与 2003 年《加入条约》同日生效，但条件是本议定书的所有批准书在该日期之前已交存。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Where not all the instruments of approval of this Protocol have been deposited before that date, this Protocol shall enter into force on the first day of the first month following the date of the deposit of the last instrument of approval.
annotations.translation: 2. 如果并非所有批准本议定书的文书都在该日期之前交存，本议定书应于最后一份批准文书交存之日后第一个月的第一天生效。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. Where not all the instruments of approval of this Protocol have been deposited before 1 May 2004, this Protocol shall apply provisionally with effect from 1 May 2004.
annotations.translation: 3. 如果在 2004 年 5 月 1 日之前未交存本议定书的所有批准书，则本议定书应自 2004 年 5 月 1 日起暂时适用。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The texts of the Agreement, the Final Act and all documents annexed to it are drawn up in the Czech, Estonian, Hungarian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Maltese, Polish, Slovak and Slovene languages.
annotations.translation: 《协定》与《最终文件》及其所附的所有文件的文本均以捷克语、爱沙尼亚语、匈牙利语、拉脱维亚语、立陶宛语、马耳他语、波兰语、斯洛伐克语和斯洛文尼亚语编写。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: These texts are annexed (¹) to this Protocol and are equally authentic with the texts in the other languages in which the Agreement, the Final Act and the documents annexed to it are drawn up.
annotations.translation: 这些文本作为本议定书的附件 (¹)，与编写《协定》、《最终文件》及其所附文件的其他语言文本具有同等效力。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This Protocol is drawn up in duplicate in the Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Maltese, Polish, Portuguese, Slovak, Slovene, Spanish, Swedish and in Azerbaijani languages, each of these texts being equally authentic.
annotations.translation: 本议定书一式两份，以捷克语、丹麦语、荷兰语、英语、爱沙尼亚语、芬兰语、法语、德语、希腊语、匈牙利语、意大利语、拉脱维亚语、立陶宛语、马耳他语、波兰语、葡萄牙语、斯洛伐克语、斯洛文尼亚语、西班牙语、瑞典语和阿塞拜疆语编写，每一种文本都具有同等效力。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (¹) The Czech, Estonian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Hungarian, Maltese, Polish, Slovak and Slovenian versions of the Agreement shall be published in the special edition of the Official Journal at a later date.
annotations.translation: (¹) 《协定》的捷克语、爱沙尼亚语、拉脱维亚语、立陶宛语、匈牙利语、马耳他语、波兰语、斯洛伐克语和斯洛文尼亚语版本应在稍后的官方公报特刊上公布。
